channel.title: Extensions on Rogee's 备忘录
channel.description: Recent content in Extensions on Rogee's 备忘录

item.title: Laravel 一些不错的扩展
item.description: 带 [-] 标签为推荐安装包 拼音 https://github.com/overtrue/laravel-pinyin https://github.com/overtrue/laravel-follow https://github.com/overtrue/laravel-favorite https://github.com/overtrue/laravel-subscribe https://github.com/overtrue/laravel-like 菜单生成 https://github.com/spatie/menu 控制台 https://github.com/spatie/laravel-dashboard Enum https://github.com/spatie/laravel-enum https://github.com/BenSampo/laravel-enum stubs https://github.com/atehnix/laravel-stubs web tinker https://github.com/spatie/laravel-web-tinker 过期文件自动删除 https://github.com/spatie/laravel-directory-cleanup sluggable https://github.com/spatie/laravel-sluggable permission https://github.com/spatie/laravel-permission 另一个权限控制 https://github.com/mateusjunges/laravel-acl docker manager https://github.com/spatie/docker html generator https://github.com/spatie/laravel-html ssh https://github.com/spatie/ssh 邮件订阅 https://github.com/spatie/laravel-newsletter flash message
